text: Yasushi Warita (born January 8, 1971) is a Japanese mixed martial artist. He competed in the Welterweight division. ==Mixed martial arts record== |- | Loss | align=center| 1–4–1 | Yuki Sasaki | Submission (heel hook) | Shooto: Gig '98 1st | | align=center| 1 | align=center| 1:19 | Tokyo, Japan | |- | Win | align=center| 1–3–1 | Toru Koga | KO (head kick) | Shooto: Vale Tudo Junction 3 | | align=center| 3 | align=center| 0:18 | Tokyo, Japan | |- | Loss | align=center| 0–3–1 | Akihiro Gono | Submission (achilles lock) | Lumax Cup: Tournament of J '96 | | align=center| 1 | align=center| 0:54 | Japan | |- | Loss | align=center| 0–2–1 | Kazuhiro Kusayanagi | Submission (armbar) | Shooto: Vale Tudo Access 4 | | align=center| 1 | align=center| 1:53 | Japan | |- | Draw | align=center| 0–1–1 | Naoki Sakurada | Draw | Vale Tudo Japan 1994 | | align=center| 5 | align=center| 3:00 | Urayasu, Chiba, Japan | |- | Loss | align=center| 0–1 | Takeshi Tanaka | Submission (achilles lock) | Lumax Cup: Tournament of J '94 | | align=center| 1 | align=center| 1:02 | Japan | ==See also== *List of male mixed martial artists ==References== ==External links== * * Yasushi Warita at mixedmartialarts.com Category:1971 births Category:Japanese male mixed martial artists Category:Welterweight mixed martial artists Category:Living people
title: Yasushi Warita
